I think this one works on XP. I could run the old games: Jazz Jack Rabbit, Cosmo Cosmic Adventure and Commander Keen on my laptop with XP. BUT, the music wouldn't work. And the SOUND is not the same as the orginal. Just learn how to reach the file while in DOS (Or MS-DOS). Its complicated, but it works!

Good Luck! :D
